teaching.topicContent: Track the 'tr' blend as in 'track.' Explore words with 'tr' such as 'train,' 'tree,' and 'truck.
Twist with the 'tw' blend as in 'twist.' Practice blending words like 'twist,' 'twig,' and 'twin.'
Shine a spotlight on the 'sh' digraph as in 'shine.' Explore words with 'sh' like 'shoe,' 'sheep,' and shark.'
Chime in with the 'ch' digraph as in 'chime.' Practice blending words like 'chat,' 'chop,' and 'chin.'
Tap into the 'th' digraph as in 'tap.' Engage with words beginning with 'th' like 'this,' 'that,' and 'thin.'
Prance along with the 'pr' sound as in 'prance.' Practice blending words like 'prize,' 'pride,' and 'print.'
Skim the surface of the 'sk' blend as in 'skim.' Engage with words like 'skip,' 'skin,' and 'sky.'
Explore words ending with the 'lt' final blend, such as 'melt,' 'felt,' and 'belt.' Practice reading and spelling these words.
Jump into words with the 'mp' final blend, like 'jump,' 'bump,' and 'camp.' Engage in activities that reinforce this blend.
Navigate through words with the 'nd' final blend, such as 'sand,' 'pond,' and 'wind.' Read and identify words that end with this blend.
Go on a word hunt for words with the 'nt' final blend, like 'hunt,' 'plant,' and 'tent.' Practice reading and writing these words.
Master words with 'mo,' 'nd,' and 'nt' final blends, such as 'pond,' 'want,' 'giant,' and 'moon.' Practice blending and segmenting these blends.

teaching.topicTitle: Uncovering Digraphs: ch, sh, th, wh
teaching.topicContent: Introduction to digraphs and practicing reading words with 'ch,' 'sh,' 'th,' and 'wh'.
Explore silent 'gh' in words and learn how it can be pronounced as /f/ and /k/.

teaching.topicTitle: Adventures in Long 'a' and 'e' with Silent 'e'
teaching.topicContent: Discover the magic of the 'e' at the end of words and how it changes short vowel sounds to long ones.
Explore vowel teams 'ai' and 'ay' to create long 'a' sounds in words.

teaching.topicTitle: Soft and Gentle: Soft 'c' and Soft 'g'
teaching.topicContent: Understand soft 'c' and soft 'g' sounds and their usage in different words.
Dive into suffixes '-less' and '-able' and their impact on words' meanings.
Explore the vowel teams 'ea' and 'ee' and practice using them in words.
Continue exploring vowel teams 'ea' and 'ee' in different words.
To identify and understand the concept of silent letters in words, specifically focusing on the letters 'k,' 'b,' and 'w.'

teaching.topicTitle: Exploring Silent Letters in Words - Part 2
teaching.topicContent: To identify and understand the concept of silent letters in words, with a focus on the letters 'g,' 'h,' and 'l.'

teaching.topicTitle: Exploring Silent Letters in Words - Part 3'
teaching.topicContent: To identify and understand the concept of silent letters in words, with a focus on the letters 'c', 'd', 'n', 't', 'p'.
Get to know the dr blend as in drum. Have students blend words starting with dr, such as drive, drop, and dry.

test.description: Put your Phonics and letter sound knowledge to the test.
